00019 import java.util.ArrayList;

00022 import android.content.Context;
00023 import android.gesture.Gesture;
00024 import android.gesture.GestureLibrary;
00025 import android.gesture.GestureOverlayView;
00026 import android.gesture.Prediction;
00027 import android.gesture.GestureOverlayView.OnGesturePerformedListener;
00028 import android.graphics.Bitmap;

00038 public class SmartMenuOverlayView extends GestureOverlayView implements OnGesturePerformedListener {
00039         // These two values will be modified according to the layout size...
00040         protected static int sCenterRadius = 32;
00041         protected static int sBranchesLength = 24;
00042         // ...but not this one
00043         protected static int sBranchesRadius = 24;
00044         
00045         // Edit these to change the drawing speed
00046         protected static int sCircleSpeed = 30;
00047         protected static int sLineSpeed = 10;
00048         
00049         // These values will be modified according to the layout size and orientation
00050         protected static int sLabelMargin = 10;
00051         protected static int sLabelHeight = 50;
00052         protected static int sLabelWidth = 200;
00053         protected static int sLabelFont = 30;
00054         
00055         // Make these static to compute them only once
00056         protected static final double RAD_45 = Math.PI/4;
00057         protected static final double COS_45 = Math.cos(RAD_45);
00058         protected static final double SIN_45 = Math.sin(RAD_45);
00059         
00060         private SmartMenuCircleView     mCircleView;
00061         private GestureLibrary          mLibrary;
00062         
00066         public SmartMenuOverlayView(Context context) {
00067                 super(context);
00068                 init(context);
00069         }
00070         
00075         public SmartMenuOverlayView(Context context, AttributeSet attributes) {
00076                 super(context, attributes);
00077                 init(context);
00078         }
00079         
00084         private void init(Context context) {
00085                 mCircleView = new SmartMenuCircleView(context, this);
00086                 mCircleView.setVisibility(INVISIBLE);
00087                 addView(mCircleView);
00088                 
00089                 addOnGesturePerformedListener(this);
00090         }
00091         
00095         public GestureLibrary getGestureLibrary() {
00096                 return mLibrary;
00097         }

00102         public void setGestureLibrary(GestureLibrary library) {
00103                 this.mLibrary = library;
00104         }

00110         public void addMenuItem(SmartMenuItem item) {
00111                 mCircleView.addMenuItem(item);
00112         }

00132                 this.mCircleView.setBackgroundColor(color);

00134         
00138         public void open(boolean animate) {
00139                 bringChildToFront(mCircleView);
00140                 mCircleView.reset();
00141                 mCircleView.setVisibility(VISIBLE);
00142                 setGestureVisible(false);
00143                 setEventsInterceptionEnabled(false);
00144                 
00145                 // Skip the animation
00146                 if (!animate) {
00147                         mCircleView.setAnimationEnd();
00148                 }
00149         }
00150         
00154         public void close() {
00155                 mCircleView.close();
00156         }
00157         
00161         public boolean isOpened() {
00162                 return (mCircleView.getVisibility() == VISIBLE);
00163         }
00164 
00165         @Override
00166         public void onGesturePerformed(GestureOverlayView overlay, Gesture gesture) {
00167                 ArrayList<Prediction> predictions = mLibrary.recognize(gesture);
00168                 
00169                 // We want at least one prediction
00170                 if (predictions.size() > 0) {
00171                         Prediction prediction = predictions.get(0);
00172                         // We want at least some confidence in the result
00173                         if (prediction.score > 1.0) {
00174                                 open(true);
00175                         }
00176                 }
00177         }
00178         
00179         protected static class SmartMenuCircleView extends View {
00180                 private int mCenterX, mCenterY;
00181                 private int mCurrentAngle = 0;
00182                 private int mCurrentBranch = 0;
00183                 private int mCurrentBranchLength = 0;
00184                 
00185                 private boolean                                 mComputedValues = false;
00186                 private Paint                                   mPainter;
00187                 private SmartMenuOverlayView    mParent;
00188                 private String                                  mText = null;
00189                 private Vector<SmartMenuItem>   mItems;
00190                 
00191                 public SmartMenuCircleView(Context context, SmartMenuOverlayView parent) {
00192                         super(context);
00193                         this.mParent = parent;
00194                         init();
00195                 }
00196                 
00197                 protected void init() {
00198                         setFocusable(true);
00199                         setFocusableInTouchMode(true);
00200                         
00201                         setBackgroundColor(Color.argb(200, 0, 0, 0));
00202                         // Init the painter, set parameters here
00203                         mPainter = new Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG);
00204                         mPainter.setStyle(Paint.Style.STROKE);
00205                         mPainter.setColor(Color.WHITE);
00206                         mPainter.setStrokeWidth(3);
00207                         mPainter.setTextAlign(Paint.Align.CENTER);
00208                         mItems = new Vector<SmartMenuItem>();
00209                 }
00210                 
00211                 protected void reset() {
00212                         mCurrentAngle = 0;
00213                         mCurrentBranch = 0;
00214                         mCurrentBranchLength = 0;
00215                         mComputedValues = false;
00216                         setText(null);
00217                         requestFocus();
00218                 }
00219                 
00220                 protected void close() {
00221                         setVisibility(INVISIBLE);
00222                         mParent.clear(false);
00223                         mParent.setGestureVisible(true);
00224                         mParent.setEventsInterceptionEnabled(true);
00225                 }
00226                 
00227                 protected void setAnimationEnd() {
00228                         mCurrentAngle = 360;
00229                         mCurrentBranch = mItems.size();
00230                 }
00231                 
00232                 protected void addMenuItem(SmartMenuItem item) {
00233                         mItems.add(item);
00234                 }
00235                 
00236                 @Override
00237                 public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event) {
00238                         switch (event.getAction()) {
00239                         case MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN:
00240                         case MotionEvent.ACTION_MOVE:
00241                                 boolean isInMenu = false;
00242                                 for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); i++) {
00243                                         int x = mItems.get(i).getX();
00244                                         int y = mItems.get(i).getY();
00245                                         
00246                                         if (Math.sqrt( (event.getX() - x)*(event.getX() - x) + (event.getY() - y) * (event.getY() - y) ) <= sBranchesRadius) {
00247                                                 if (getText() == null || getText().equals(mItems.get(i).getText())) {
00248                                                         setText(mItems.get(i).getText());
00249                                                         invalidate();
00250                                                 }
00251                                                 isInMenu = true;
00252                                         }
00253                                 }
00254                                 if (!isInMenu) {
00255                                         if (getText() != null) {
00256                                                 setText(null);
00257                                                 invalidate();
00258                                         }
00259                                 }
00260                                 break;
00261                         case MotionEvent.ACTION_UP:
00262                                 for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); i++) {
00263                                         int x = mItems.get(i).getX();
00264                                         int y = mItems.get(i).getY();
00265                                         
00266                                         if (Math.sqrt( (event.getX() - x)*(event.getX() - x) + (event.getY() - y) * (event.getY() - y) ) <= sBranchesRadius) {
00267                                                 if (mItems.get(i).onItemSelected()) {
00268                                                         // Close the menu
00269                                                         close();
00270                                                 }
00271                                         }
00272                                 }
00273                                 break;
00274                         default:
00275                         }
00276                         return true;
00277                 }
00278                 
00279                 @Override
00280                 public boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode, KeyEvent event) {
00281                         if (keyCode == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BACK) {
00282                                 close();
00283                         }
00284                         return true;
00285                 }
00286 
00287                 @Override
00288                 public void onDraw(Canvas canvas) {
00289                         // Init global values
00290                         if (!mComputedValues) { // Do it only once until reset
00291                                 if (getMeasuredHeight() > 400) {
00292                                         sLabelHeight = 40;
00293                                         sLabelMargin = 10;
00294                                         sLabelFont = 30;
00295                                 } else {
00296                                         sLabelHeight = 20;
00297                                         sLabelMargin = 5;
00298                                         sLabelFont = 15;
00299                                 }
00300                                 
00301                                 if (getMeasuredWidth() > getMeasuredHeight()) {
00302                                         // Landscape
00303                                         sBranchesLength = sCenterRadius = getMeasuredHeight() / 4 - sBranchesRadius - 5;
00304                                         sLabelWidth = getMeasuredWidth()/2 - sCenterRadius * 2 - sBranchesRadius * 2 - sLabelMargin;
00305                                 } else {
00306                                         // Portrait
00307                                         sBranchesLength = sCenterRadius = getMeasuredWidth() / 4 - sBranchesRadius - 5;
00308                                         sLabelWidth = getMeasuredWidth() - 2 * sLabelMargin;
00309                                 }
00310                                 
00311                                 mCenterX = getMeasuredWidth() / 2 ;
00312                                 mCenterY = getMeasuredHeight() / 2 ;
00313                                 
00314                                 mComputedValues = true;
00315                         }
00316                         
00317                         // Draw the label only if necessary
00318                         if (mText != null && mText.length() > 0) {
00319                                 drawLabel(canvas, mText);
00320                         }
00321                         
00322                         // Draw the centered circle
00323                         canvas.drawArc(new RectF(mCenterX-sCenterRadius, mCenterY-sCenterRadius, mCenterX+sCenterRadius, mCenterY+sCenterRadius),
00324                                         -90, mCurrentAngle, false, mPainter);
00325                         
00326                         if (mCurrentAngle < 360) {
00327                                 mCurrentAngle += sCircleSpeed;
00328                                 invalidate();
00329                                 return;
00330                         } else {
00331                                 // End of circle, draw branches
00332                                 if (mItems.size() <= 4) {
00333                                         // Use positions 0, 2, 4, 6
00334                                         for (int i=0; i<mCurrentBranch; i++) {
00335                                                 drawBranch(canvas, i*2, sBranchesLength, mItems.get(i));
00336                                         }
00337                                         
00338                                         if (mCurrentBranch < mItems.size()) {
00339                                                 drawBranch(canvas, mCurrentBranch*2, mCurrentBranchLength, mItems.get(mCurrentBranch));
00340                                                 
00341                                                 if (mCurrentBranchLength >= sBranchesLength) {
00342                                                         // Go to the next branch
00343                                                         mCurrentBranchLength = 0;
00344                                                         mCurrentBranch++;
00345                                                 } else {
00346                                                         mCurrentBranchLength += sLineSpeed;
00347                                                 }
00348                                                 invalidate();
00349                                                 return;
00350                                         } else {
00351                                                 // Ended
00352                                         }
00353                                 } else {
00354                                         // Use all positions
00355                                         for (int i=0; i<mCurrentBranch; i++) {
00356                                                 drawBranch(canvas, i, sBranchesLength, mItems.get(i));
00357                                         }
00358                                         
00359                                         if (mCurrentBranch < mItems.size()) {
00360                                                 drawBranch(canvas, mCurrentBranch, mCurrentBranchLength, mItems.get(mCurrentBranch));
00361                                                 
00362                                                 if (mCurrentBranchLength >= sBranchesLength) {
00363                                                         mCurrentBranchLength = 0;
00364                                                         mCurrentBranch++;
00365                                                 } else {
00366                                                         mCurrentBranchLength += sLineSpeed;
00367                                                 }
00368                                                 invalidate();
00369                                                 return;
00370                                         } else {
00371                                                 // Ended
00372                                         }
00373                                 }
00374                         }
00375                 }
00376                 
00377                 private void drawBranch(Canvas canvas, int position, int length, SmartMenuItem icon) {
00378                         float x1=0, x2=0, y1=0, y2=0, x3=0, y3=0;
00379                         switch (position) {
00380                         case 0:
00381                                 x1 = x2 = x3 = mCenterX;
00382                                 y1 = mCenterY - sCenterRadius;
00383                                 y2 = y1 - length;
00384                                 y3 = y2 - sBranchesRadius;
00385                                 break;
00386                         case 1:
00387                                 x1 = (float)(mCenterX + COS_45 * sCenterRadius);
00388                                 y1 = (float)(mCenterY - SIN_45 * sCenterRadius);
00389                                 x2 = (float)(x1 + COS_45 * length);
00390                                 y2 = (float)(y1 - SIN_45 * length);
00391                                 x3 = (float)(x2 + COS_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00392                                 y3 = (float)(y2 - SIN_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00393                                 break;
00394                         case 2:
00395                                 y1 = y2 = y3 = mCenterY;
00396                                 x1 = mCenterX + sCenterRadius;
00397                                 x2 = x1 + length;
00398                                 x3 = x2 + sBranchesRadius;
00399                                 break;
00400                         case 3:
00401                                 x1 = (float)(mCenterX + COS_45 * sCenterRadius);
00402                                 y1 = (float)(mCenterY + SIN_45 * sCenterRadius);
00403                                 x2 = (float)(x1 + COS_45 * length);
00404                                 y2 = (float)(y1 + SIN_45 * length);
00405                                 x3 = (float)(x2 + COS_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00406                                 y3 = (float)(y2 + SIN_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00407                                 break;
00408                         case 4:
00409                                 x1 = x2 = x3 = mCenterX;
00410                                 y1 = mCenterY + sCenterRadius;
00411                                 y2 = y1 + length;
00412                                 y3 = y2 + sBranchesRadius;
00413                                 break;
00414                         case 5:
00415                                 x1 = (float)(mCenterX - COS_45 * sCenterRadius);
00416                                 y1 = (float)(mCenterY + SIN_45 * sCenterRadius);
00417                                 x2 = (float)(x1 - COS_45 * length);
00418                                 y2 = (float)(y1 + SIN_45 * length);
00419                                 x3 = (float)(x2 - COS_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00420                                 y3 = (float)(y2 + SIN_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00421                                 break;
00422                         case 6:
00423                                 y1 = y2 = y3 = mCenterY;
00424                                 x1 = mCenterX - sCenterRadius;
00425                                 x2 = x1 - length;
00426                                 x3 = x2 - sBranchesRadius;
00427                                 break;
00428                         case 7:
00429                                 x1 = (float)(mCenterX - COS_45 * sCenterRadius);
00430                                 y1 = (float)(mCenterY - SIN_45 * sCenterRadius);
00431                                 x2 = (float)(x1 - COS_45 * length);
00432                                 y2 = (float)(y1 - SIN_45 * length);
00433                                 x3 = (float)(x2 - COS_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00434                                 y3 = (float)(y2 - SIN_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00435                                 break;
00436                         default:
00437                                 return;
00438                         }
00439                         
00440                         canvas.drawLine(x1, y1, x2, y2, mPainter);
00441                         // Draw the final circle
00442                         if (length >= sBranchesLength) {
00443                                 icon.setPosition((int)x3, (int)y3);
00444                                 canvas.drawBitmap(icon.getIcon(), x3 - sBranchesRadius, y3 - sBranchesRadius, mPainter);
00445                                 canvas.drawCircle(x3, y3, sBranchesRadius, mPainter);
00446                         }
00447                 }
00448         
00449                 public void drawLabel(Canvas canvas, String text) {
00450                         RectF rect = new RectF(sLabelMargin, sLabelMargin, sLabelMargin + sLabelWidth, sLabelMargin + sLabelHeight);
00451                         canvas.drawRoundRect(rect, 10, 10, mPainter);
00452                         Paint textPainter = new Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG);
00453                         textPainter.setTextAlign(Paint.Align.CENTER);
00454                         textPainter.setTextSize(sLabelFont);
00455                         textPainter.setColor(Color.WHITE);
00456                         canvas.drawText(mText, sLabelMargin + sLabelWidth/2, sLabelMargin*2 + sLabelHeight/2, textPainter);
00457                 }

00468         public static class SmartMenuItem {
00469                 private String mText;
00470                 private Bitmap mIcon;
00471                 // Position is used to test if the user is touching one of the elements
00472                 private int mX = 0, mY = 0;
00473

00479                         this.mText = text;
00480                         this.setIcon(icon);
00481                 }

00501                         this.mIcon = SmartMenuIconFactory.createRoundedBitmap(icon);

00549                         return true;

00553         public static class SmartMenuIconFactory {
00558                 public static Bitmap createRoundedBitmap(Bitmap input) {
00559                         // Create the mask
00560                         Bitmap mask = Bitmap.createBitmap(sBranchesRadius * 2, sBranchesRadius * 2, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);
00561                         Canvas maskCanvas = new Canvas(mask);
00562                         maskCanvas.drawARGB(0, 255, 255, 255);
00563                         
00564                         // Draw the circle into the mask
00565                         Paint painter = new Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG);
00566                         painter.setStyle(Paint.Style.FILL);
00567                         painter.setColor(Color.argb(255, 0, 0, 0));
00568                         maskCanvas.drawCircle(sBranchesRadius, sBranchesRadius, sBranchesRadius, painter);
00569                         
00570                         // Copy only the central part from the bitmap
00571                         int beginX = input.getWidth() / 2 - sBranchesRadius;
00572                         int beginY = input.getHeight() / 2 - sBranchesRadius;
00573                         Bitmap temp = Bitmap.createBitmap(input, beginX, beginY, sBranchesRadius*2, sBranchesRadius*2);
00574                         Bitmap output = temp.copy(Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888, true);
00575                         // Apply the mask
00576                         for (int i=0; i<output.getWidth(); i++) {
00577                                 for (int j=0; j<output.getHeight(); j++) {
00578                                         int a = Color.alpha(mask.getPixel(i, j));
00579                                         if (a == 0)
00580                                                 output.setPixel(i, j, Color.argb(0, 255, 0, 0));
00581                                 }
00582                         }
00583                         
00584                         // Really needed ? Transparency doesn't work without this...
00585                         Bitmap newoutput = Bitmap.createBitmap(sBranchesRadius * 2, sBranchesRadius * 2, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);
00586                         Canvas outputCanvas = new Canvas(newoutput);
00587                         outputCanvas.drawARGB(0, 255, 255, 255);
00588                         outputCanvas.drawBitmap(output, 0, 0, painter);
00589                         
00590                         return newoutput;
00591                 }
00592         }
